description.raw:
Fixes issue #92

[Robot configurations](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/robots) with stereo cameras \(\*\_CONFIG\_5\) now output camera image data to these topics, i.e.

* /<robot\_name>/front/left/image\_raw
* /<robot\_name>/front/left/camera\_info
* /<robot\_name>/front/right/image\_raw
* /<robot\_name>/front/right/camera\_info

I also had to update `X2 Config 5` model's camera sensor name to be consistent with other models so that its camera data can be piped properly. The new model has been uploaded onto fuel so you'll need to remove the `X2 Config 5` directory in fuel cache: `~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X2 Config 5`

I also made changes to prevent piping 2d laser scan data if the robot is using 3d lidar.
description.html:
Fixes issue #92

Robot configurations with stereo cameras (*_CONFIG_5) now output camera image data to these topics, i.e.

  • /<robot_name>/front/left/image_raw
  • /<robot_name>/front/left/camera_info
  • /<robot_name>/front/right/image_raw
  • /<robot_name>/front/right/camera_info

I also had to update X2 Config 5 model's camera sensor name to be consistent with other models so that its camera data can be piped properly. The new model has been uploaded onto fuel so you'll need to remove the X2 Config 5 directory in fuel cache: ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X2 Config 5

I also made changes to prevent piping 2d laser scan data if the robot is using 3d lidar.

title.raw: Fix stereo cam and 3d lidar sensor data topics
